class cosmos.commands.Fit(app, app_args, cmd_name=None)[source]¶

Bases: cliff.command.Command

Fit the data to the model

Example:

cosmos fit tracker path/to/dataset

class cosmos.commands.Glimpse(app, app_args, cmd_name=None)[source]¶

Bases: cliff.command.Command

Read the data from glimpse files and save it in the CoSMoS native format.

Path names to glimpse files can be provided by the dataset.cfg file, or alternatively, at the prompt input.

get_parser(prog_name)[source]¶

Return an argparse.ArgumentParser.

Override to do something useful.

The returned value will be returned by the program.
